column2: Cronos Group, Inc. engages in the production and distribution of cannabis. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Ontario. The firm operates through its subsidiaries and licensed producers: Peace Naturals Project Inc, which was the non-incumbent medical cannabis license granted by Health Canada, and Original BC Ltd, which is based in the Okanagan Valley British Columbia. The firm has multiple international production and distribution platforms. The company focuses on building an international brand portfolio and developing intellectual property. The firm's portfolio, includes Peace Naturals, a company licensed to produce and sell medical marijuana as well as cultivate cannabis oil; Original BC (OGBC), a company that is licensed to cultivate and sell medical marijuana; Whistler Medical Marijuana Company (WMMC), a company licensed to produce and sell medical marijuana as well as cultivate cannabis oil.
